Name: Doomcaller
Description: A gloomy person that sees the apocalypse once in a while. You'd be gloomy too. If they look at the sky like they're waiting for something to happen, find a place to hide.

Attacks.Attack Description: Gives a unit a tiny taste of the apocalypse. If you get hit with it enough times, you might be able to build up a tolerance to bigger apocalypses.
